text: Selena had his voice I was just in awe
of every performance that she was a part
of as soon as she went onstage she
became somebody else we couldn't imagine
how big she was going to become and you
know it eventually became this
nationwide thing with the the push of
the mainstream English record and I
could fall in love that record just kind
of pushed her over the top
besides our being a talented individual
you know she had distinct and made
people want to get closer to her
Yolanda was at first she was the
president of the fan club she ran all
that stuff and then little by little she
started working with Selena as a
personal assistant and then managing the
boutique and then just kind of whatever
Selena needed her to do for her at the
beginning I never saw or imagined there
would be a problem with Yolanda
Selena started hiring people to work for
her to work on the Selena etcetera
boutique and salon the employees they
were they were saying a lot of things
that Yolanda didn't of course at first
it's kind of hard to believe because you
I didn't expect that Selena didn't
expect that and then when issues of
money being gone popped up I mean that's
really when everything we started
closing everything up around her it's
not like we thought that this person was
possible of the act that she committed
the morning of March 31st Selena got up
early I didn't even think to go hey so
where are you going no red flags went up
I didn't think anything about her going
to the hotel by herself where Yolanda
was a woman is still inside her pickup
truck now I am being told by reliable
police sources that the woman could be
the singers manager or one of her
managers everything had already happened
by the time I first got word I was told
that Selena had been shot by Yolanda the
ambulance got there I knew they had
tried to give her a blood transfusion
but that it was too late
I couldn't believe what was going on it
was almost like a bad dream
I feel really sad because I used to
listen to her music when they told me I
didn't believe it I couldn't believe it
you know I was just numb I went into a
sort of shock we the jury having found
the defendant guilty of murder assess
her punishment confinement in the
institutional division the Texas
Department of Criminal Justice for life
I just started living life with blinders
on and not thinking too much about what
was to my left and my right but what
wasn't immediately right in front of me
and at that time it was just dealing
with not having her anymore
the lasting image that I have of Selena
is that huge smile
when I hear her on the radio a lot of
times I can smile now
you
